AliasId.description: Unique identifier for a fleet alias. Specify an alias to retrieve information on all game sessions active on the fleet.

FleetId.description: Unique identifier for a fleet. Specify a fleet to retrieve information on all game sessions active on the fleet.

GameSessionId.description: Unique identifier for the game session to retrieve information on. Game session ID format is as follows: 'arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::gamesession/fleet-<fleet ID>/<ID string>'. The value of <ID string> is either a custom ID string (if one was specified when the game session was created) an autogenerated string.

Limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Use this parameter with NextToken to get results as a set of sequential pages.

NextToken.description: Token indicating the start of the next sequential page of results. Use the token that is returned with a previous call to this action. To specify the start of the result set, do not specify a value.

StatusFilter.description: Game session status to filter results on. Possible game session statuses include ACTIVE, TERMINATED, ACTIVATING, and TERMINATING (the last two are transitory).
